title: TRAILER MASH-UP: Watch Dogs & Person of Interest
author: Zeb Ekeroth
comment: The ultimate irony is that in the French version of the game, the voice actor who does Pearce is the same who does Reese in POI...
When you combine the combat abilities of John Reese and the hacking skills of Harold Finch, you get this. 😁

Aiden Pearce = John Reese/Harold Finch
"The Fox/Vigilante" = "The Man in the Suit"
Clara Lille = Root
Jordi Chin = Sameen Shaw/Rick Dillinger
This is such an amazing video.
description:
Ubisoft's Watch Dogs and CBS's Person of Interest share several themes and visual styles, and although others have made their own versions, this fan trailer I've created attempts to combine the two properties in a way you haven't seen yet. Please enjoy this video and let me know what you think in the comments below.

Also, don't forget to subscribe! This channel is only just getting started...

Check out my first fan trailer for Watch Dogs here:
